title: AI File Organizer
description: Organizes codebases for Claude AI analysis.
content:
# AI File Organizer

This project helps developers organize their codebases for AI analysis. It automatically scans through your project directories, identifies key components, and generates a structured representation that makes it easier for AI assistants to understand your codebase.

## Features

- Automatic file organization
- Code structure analysis
- Intelligent categorization
- Integration with Claude AI

## Technical Details

Built with Python and Flask, the application uses advanced text processing algorithms to parse and organize code files.

title: E-Commerce Dashboard
description: Analytics dashboard for online retail stores.
content:
# E-Commerce Dashboard

A comprehensive analytics solution for online retail businesses. This dashboard provides real-time insights into sales, customer behavior, and inventory management.

## Features

- Real-time sales tracking
- Customer behavior analysis
- Inventory management
- Customizable reports

## Technical Details

Built with a React frontend, Node.js backend, and MongoDB for data storage. Uses Chart.js for data visualization.

title: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio website with dark mode support.
content:
# Portfolio Website

This project is my personal portfolio website, designed to showcase my work and skills as a developer. It features a clean, responsive design with dark mode support.

## Features

- Responsive Design
- Dark Mode Support
- Project Showcase
- Contact Form

## Technical Details

The portfolio uses React for the frontend and Flask for the backend API. The site is deployed on Render.com.

title: Task Management API
description: RESTful API for task management applications.
content:
# Task Management API

A robust RESTful API built for task management applications, providing endpoints for task creation, organization, assignment, and team collaboration.

## Features

- User Authentication
- Task Management
- Task Organization
- Team Collaboration

## Technical Details

Built with Python Flask and PostgreSQL, this API follows RESTful principles and incorporates modern authentication practices.
